channel.title: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?
channel.description: I saw others do it, but is there a strict command? Or is it just certain servers? If you know the answer, post. Please, Thank You :cool:

item.title: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok1 mod_taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok1 wrote:

TRY THIS ::pnpc 50 become black dragon or ::pnpc 9 become a guard

Read full topic
item.source: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?

item.title: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

EDITED Aw..It dosn't work. Sad

Are you sure you set up as the highest level admin?
All the commands are in the clienthandler, so you can verify that it’s there and it should be working, if you scroll to line 685. You can also check to see what conditions must be fulfilled and that you are fulfilling them.

What error if any do you get in the console?

Read full topic
item.source: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?

item.title: How, by being an admin, do I turn into an npc?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Answered in FAQ:

::pnpc
This command changes you to an NPC. For example “::pnpc 500” turns you into a jungle warrior.

Read full topic
